# The `StatisticInfo` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class is used in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/managedstatic">ManagedStatic</a> so that it is created on demand (when the first statistic is bumped) and destroyed only when llvm&#95;shutdown is called. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class is used in a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/managedstatic">ManagedStatic</a> so that it is created on demand (when the first statistic is bumped) and destroyed only when llvm&#95;shutdown is called.

We print statistics from the destructor. This class is also used to look up statistic values from applications that use LLVM.

Definition at line 66 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/statistic-cpp">Statistic.cpp</a>.
